website_summaries.verdict: Low-priced charging station for up to 4 Joy-Cons.
pros: Despite the low price, this is a reliable charging station that works well if all you need to charge are Joy-Cons
The indicator lights aren't too bright, and the station plugs directly into the dock via USB
cons: Some customers reported that their station only partially charges their Joy-Cons

customer_reviews.title: Only caught on fire twice
customer_reviews.text: when I was playing Breath of the Wild on Death Mountain. The charger did not, however, catch on fire. It charged my joycons to a full capacity and holds them really snugly. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: As a gamer now disabled by cancer, I can't get to my Switch with any ease, as it mostly lives in its TV dock across the room. I'd at least be able to play until my cons needed charging, and then I would have to have someone else handy who could put them on the console to charge, and then be there to take them off. I needed a charger within my reach, and this one filled that void successfully. And, it charging four at a time made it a win/win. It's built solid and sturdy, and the top-mounted charge lights are easy to see from where I am. I should've bought this when I first bought the system.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: It does charge my joycons, however the insertion process is not as smooth as I would like it to be
customer_reviews.text: It does charge my joycons, however the feel of which the controllers go in is not as seamless as that when you place your joycons on the switch or on a nintendo joycon holder. There is going to be a level of resistance. It does get better with time (the more you insert and remove them) as seen on the right. The one on the left I bought for my bestfriend, and was testing out before giving it to him and I can say that they have the same experience in terms of insertion and removal. So that is something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Ysabella Ocampo Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Multiple Joy-Cons
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Took a few times to get used to getting it off the stand, but that's just because I have fat fingers and it's difficult to get to the little button. The red and green charging indicator lights make it easy to know if your joy con is fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Leftwich

customer_reviews.title: Get this one, it's high quality. I got burned on another brand, this one is AWESOME.
customer_reviews.text: Joycon fit a little tight into the rails at first, but that's literally the only complaint I could find and I'm only mentioning it for the sake of being 100% complete and accurate here. The charger works fantastically and everything from the packaging to the plastic molding says it's high quality compared to others on Amazon. If you're looking for one of these style Joycon chargers, get this one. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KenjiFox

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Compliments the Switch
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased by the build quality, value, and overall design of this little charging unit. It looks great next to the Switch and will spare the console from little kids trying to rip the controllers off to play the games. The controllers slide in snuggly and click into place and, as other reviewers have noted, and you have to know to push the little button on the back of the controllers to dislodge them. Time will tell how reliable and effective this unit is. It looks good so far.
customer_reviews.author: BronxD

customer_reviews.title: Grip of death
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience of charging both sets of controllers at the same time. It works as described and looks handsome in the room. My only gripe is the controllers are very hard to remove from the stand! Pressing the release button on the controller and pulling should be all it takes. But this stand has ridiculous grip that makes removing the controllers a bit of a burden. I will still be keeping it as it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Noah P

customer_reviews.title: Controllers are always ready to go
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase. We had problems with the controllers constantly dying because we failed to cycle them onto the switch to charge. Having the option to simply slide them back onto the charger is wonderful. Doesn't take a whole lot of effort to put them on or take them off. I love the indicator LED's at the top of the charger. They are seriously bright. One of the charger channels is tighter than the others, but since I'm not sure if its the charger or the controller its not a serious gripe. Overall, I would recommend this charger to anyone. Made my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: BSL

customer_reviews.title: One part doesnt work?
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it and the idea but have two big issues. First - the right side front port doesn't change to green so I'm not sure if it's charged or not (have to test if it just doesn't show its charged but actually works) Second- Holy mother of God, how tight it is to get any of the joy cons to slide in! Sometimes It takes me a bit to get it to actually go in and start charging cause of how hard it is to slide down. These two things along kind of make this a regretful buy. Especially if the front port doesn't work at all...
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: it works as original and looks good too. Indicators work just fine as well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Kinda hurt that the original accessory from Hori just got on sale after a few days I bought this. Still, it works as original and looks good too. Indicators work just fine as well. One down side is that it's a bit stiff. I gotta push a little hard to put joy cons to the charger, which makes me worry if I would break my joy cons.
customer_reviews.author: Sang-Cheol Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works fine!
customer_reviews.text: Got this because I have too many joy cons and needed to charge them all. It works fine, although the first time I put the joy cons on, no light came on, so I was a little confused if it was charging or not. I think my only gripe was that it is a USB plug at the end and I couldn't plug it directly into the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little charger
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little charger. It quick charges 4 Joy Cons just as advertised. The LED indicator lights tell you when each Joy Con is fully charged and it uses USB power so you can plug it into the back of the Switch. Nothing too exciting, but works precisely as you'd expect and hope.
customer_reviews.author: Y. HSUEH

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cause i didnt want to keep pulling controllers on and off switch. Does what it says, but needs to be plugged into switch, not other usb devices to charge. My only complaint is that its hard to put the joycons on and off it. Have to pull a little. Doesnt just slide on and off like switch, but does wht i need it to do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, great for storing 4 controllers. I've been using this for a couple months now with no problem. Beyond being able to charge four controllers at once, it's great for just simply storing them next to my Switch. With 3 boys in the house, it's very easy to "lose" controllers. This helps keep them in one place once they're done with the Switch.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great, charges great!
customer_reviews.text: Charges the joycons, looks good, and doesn’t use up a whole outlet plug! It is a little tight getting them in and out, and the Leds on top were so bright I covered them with some tape, but a definite 10/10
customer_reviews.author: cookrw

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only had this about a week and so far no problems. I did noticed it charged the controllers pretty quickly. I went with this one over the one that had the full lights because I didn’t want a glowing light and the controlllers actually clip in with this one. This does plug into the Switch
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I put it to work right away after I received this item. I purchased two extra controllers for my Nintendo switch and it charged them to full capacity in less than 2 hours with no problem. It's small and compact but gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: T Long

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works. What more is there to say? It's nice to have something other than the main system to charge joy cons? Yeah, it is. The USB power cord? Well, I have a cell phone USB cord adapter that I used though the dock has a port in the back. So, it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product works great with the joy con controllers. The base is stable enough to not tip over and seems to be well made. Plugs directly into the switch to power the charging stand. Would recommend to anyone looking to buy a charging rack for the controllers. The lights do stay on green once charged, so if you sleep with it in a dark room it will glow.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, charges well!
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. I’ve dropped it a couple times and it still works flawlessly. The lights always stay on which could be annoying to some. Charges pretty quickly too however I can’t say how long it takes.
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works for what it's meant to be. However it does have a USB 2.0 cord going into a USB 3 port on the Nintendo Switch so it loses a lot of it's potential energy. Charges the joy cons though.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this because I had multiple different joycons that all needed to be charged as I hosted tournaments. For this cheap, this is a great value and it is definitely very helpful and saves a lot of time and energy. For anyone, that has a few bucks to spare, I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: SSH

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: When I got it only three of the port charge. Now I'm down to only two charging. Spend a little more to get a better quality charging deck.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Charges them all
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our switch controllers because we have 4 that need charging when we all use them. So far so good charges them all great and my kids haven’t had any issues putting them on or taking them off.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Broken chord upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: My chord was broken before I opened the package. I was very excited because of all the good reviews, but this is a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: goemacher

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because my Switch stopped charging the joycons. Saw this recommended on a YouTube and it works well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jordi

customer_reviews.title: good size, easy hook up.
customer_reviews.text: good price and serve the purpose. it will be even better if it is easier to slide in and out the controllers
customer_reviews.author: Bonk

customer_reviews.title: Easy upgrade for the Switch
customer_reviews.text: You will need this if you run 4 or more controllers. I would have given it 5 stars if only for it takes about 2 hours to charge even if the controllers are not totally dead.
customer_reviews.author: Mozzberg

customer_reviews.title: Decieving
customer_reviews.text: Always says the controllers are charged, but when we use it, the controllers are only half charged. Not too happy.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Had no issue with charging the joy cons. Easy to put them on and take off. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: the 1 n only

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you have multiple controllers
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and have 2 controllers, making sure they are both charged can be a hassle. With this dock, I know all 4 of the controllers are always charged. The lights makes it very easy to know when the controller is currently charging (RED) and when it is fully charged (GREEN).
customer_reviews.author: Steve Duco

customer_reviews.title: Great for charging multiple joycon
customer_reviews.text: Great for charging. Does not come with charging brick though. So if you don’t have extra laying around be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: JoshDavis

customer_reviews.title: Charges all my extra joycons so they are at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Charges all my extra joycons so they are at the ready all the time. Slots are a little tight compared to the switch, so that's why 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient! Works great, love that was can charge 4 chargers at a time
customer_reviews.author: Crystal coulter

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Its red when you first connect the joy cons and turns green when fully charge. The only thing that I don’t like is that they are really really hard to take out the joy cons.
customer_reviews.author: Erica cruz

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My child dropped the switch in the toiler so the right joycon no longer charges on the switch itself. We picked this up since the price was cheap. It works great. Charges the joycons very quickly, and with no issue. Owned for a weeks now, so quality it holding up just fine
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Markowitz

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 ports work
customer_reviews.text: Only two of the ports charge the controllers. For the other two, the indicator turns green immediately after plugging in the controllers regardless of battery level and they don't charge at all. Left one in for at least a day in the non-working port to confirm and it was still not fully charged when we went to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: No good..
customer_reviews.text: Garbage..don't buy Authentic Nintendo Joycon or newer models may won't charge and damage your Joycon controllers.
customer_reviews.author: SargentJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This stand can hold 4 joy-cons at the same time and it just works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ousama Alkahwaji

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for Christmas. Good quality and keep his controllers charged and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Shutt

customer_reviews.title: Works about as expected
customer_reviews.text: This charger works about as expected. One of the charging ports sometimes seems to struggle compared to the others, but it still eventually charges all controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Hoke

customer_reviews.title: This broke after the first use
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it was defective or what, but I wouldn't purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Peter F

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: works great, allows controllers to charge when not playing. Not only if Nintendo switch can work on their connectivity issues!
customer_reviews.author: rick901

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The design and quality of this product is pretty good. You can charge four controller parts at once. Only negative thing is that it charges a little slow.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Heiser

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient and great for keeping my spare joycons somewhere ...
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient and great for keeping my spare joycons somewhere beside the floor or next to my switch (should really clean my room)
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Manuel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to take out for kids.
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok, but to take the joycon out from the charger is cumbersome for my kids to take out and even for myself. So I return it and I went with the HyperX Chargeplay Quad. It was night and day difference to take out the joycon and to recharge. Plus it's better quality. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel N.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: One of the four charger slots would not engage with our joy cons. Tried all four of them and it wouldn’t work. Four weeks to get a replacement :(
customer_reviews.author: J. Shackman

customer_reviews.title: Regretful
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have researched other products. Very cheaply made. Only includes usb charger, no wall adapter. Only the back chargers seem to work for the joy cons, have had no luck charging in the front spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good dual charger
customer_reviews.text: Charges two joy con controllers at once, has a charge indicator light. No issues so far, good price for a unit like this.
customer_reviews.author: o

customer_reviews.title: Good charger, not compatable with NES controllers.
customer_reviews.text: Charger works well and provides a quick charge to joy-cons. Classic NES controller will fit for storage, but will charge as they are just a bit too long for the base on this charger
customer_reviews.author: Ken Brockman

customer_reviews.title: Chaos at ease
customer_reviews.text: My youngest son's switch wouldn't charge the left controller, so we would have to sync it to his brothers, needless to say it was chaos. Luckily I found this item and it brought such ease to my boys and my hectic mom life all controllers are charged no fighting and they last a bit
customer_reviews.author: Donaliz

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. We’ve been using it for months with no issues. The led lights are bright but it’s not in our bedroom so it doesn’t matter.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Leighty

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is priced right.
customer_reviews.text: It has worked every single time. No complaints here. Nice price and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Nome63

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to charge multiple controllers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to charge multiple controllers. My kids are able to do it without any issues. A great buy overall
customer_reviews.author: Weekend Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Happiness here
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s a great buy and very easy to use and it has color coded lighting when it’s charging or not. Very bright lights could use as a night light lol
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Langstaff

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: A cheap charging doc for my controllers. All the ports light up and charge properly, so no complaints. The fit and finish is also good.
customer_reviews.author: Phuong

customer_reviews.title: Minor Removal Difficulty
customer_reviews.text: Charges them without problem. But a little bit difficult to get the controllers out when finished charging. Minor problem, still a great product
customer_reviews.author: Esad Sinanovic

customer_reviews.title: connection error
customer_reviews.text: What often happens is that the right con can't be recognized.
customer_reviews.author: rayking

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Has lasted a full year of constant use by teenagers
customer_reviews.author: MORECOFFEEPLS

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for those with more than one set of joy cons
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a great price! I used to get so frustrated that I could never keep all my joy cons charged, but then I found this and it has proved to be the perfect solution. If you have more than one set of joy cons, this will definitely help you out!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Cashmore

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The dock arrived when promised. It was a Christmas gift to my grandson. He likes that it has a charging port in the back.
customer_reviews.author: mkgrammy  i love the challenge of this game.

customer_reviews.title: A nice, simple charger
customer_reviews.text: A nice simple charger that does what is advertised. The indicator light doesn't turn off while a joy con is connected, charging or full but I just cover it up during night.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Small size and keeps ‘em charged
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit light feeling on the top, but the bottom is definitely weighted so I’m not too worried about it falling over with the slightest touch. Plus it works as intended, keeps my joy cons charged.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about this charger. I read one about the joy cons not sliding on easily but mine have had no problem. This keeps all of my joy cons ready for some multiplayer action.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and seems to work great so far
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Afman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Much cheaper than buying in a store, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Aubree Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome device. Can charge 4 controllers and is pretty quick. Easy to place on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. No issues with performance, battery life, or excessive charge times. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: JMIII

customer_reviews.title: Works and it’s compact
customer_reviews.text: I like how compact this is. It isn’t another bulky thing taking up room near the TV. It’s easy to use and charge/store the controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Delossantos

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: It charges all four of my joycon, it has been a month or two now and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: asasa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this for my son! He was able to charge all of his joy cons without any issues! Works fast and effectively!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough. I had to modify it to take the NES controllers, but modifying was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Thom Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to charge 4 controllers at once. LEDs turn green when fully charged and red while not charged.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy to charge 4 controllers at once. LEDs turn green when fully charged and red while not charged.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Cambria

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic accessory for any switch owner.
customer_reviews.text: If you have more than two joycons, buy this! It came exactly as advertised and works exactly as it should. The color and material exactly matches the dock of the Switch so it won’t look out of place.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well.
customer_reviews.text: The joycons do not slide on smoothly and the get stuck. Terrible product!
customer_reviews.author: Niamh Mohan

customer_reviews.title: I’m a happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I’ve always got a charged set of joy cons.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Charges perfectly and gives a place to store the remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Teodulo Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: You’ll always have a set of controllers charged with this. Holds 2 sets and looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: C Flournoy

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Better than the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, love that it uses usb to charge. It charges my controllers quickly and I like the indicator light that lets me know when they're done charging.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 joycons, it keeps them all charged for Smash Bros tournaments.
customer_reviews.author: S Mikes.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today... it feels really cheap. It’s hard to plug in and pull out joy con. Im gonna return it. Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Abrasive
customer_reviews.text: The product feels cheap. Specifically, sliding the Joy-cons in and out of the charger is abrasive. My five-year old and spouse both complained to me, so I wound up buying a charger from another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M.

customer_reviews.title: Charges need to be faster but works very well!!
customer_reviews.text: I love having this device to charge up multiple joycon. I just wish that it would faster other than that it works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: So so abrasive on the joycon
customer_reviews.text: Don't recommend buying this- was very tough and abrasive sliding joycons in and out. Used it once and never again. There are other brands that are slightly more expensive but definitely better quality. Try something different!!
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well and you can plug it in to the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Feedjimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for the controllers
customer_reviews.text: Everything that we expected from Nintendo. On a side note, the controllers seem to die out at a disproportionate rate.
customer_reviews.author: 808vbstyle702

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Attractive price and works great, heck even my 4 and 6 year old can easily put on and remove the controllers without issue.
customer_reviews.author: chaedog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item for the price ✔️
customer_reviews.text: It does the work, not that fast but it does ir 🎮🕹️🔋
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Valles

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. This Joy Con Charger Dock is as advertised. No issues with detaching joy con and charges all four of our joy cons simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: @llBueno

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Works great, and has a light indicator (green) if charged and (Red) if charging!
customer_reviews.author: Ally & Ryan Boyd

customer_reviews.title: great device.
customer_reviews.text: Works well to keep the joy cons charged...as long as my people remember to connect them ;)

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Essential if you use your switch Joycons off the device

customer_reviews.title: This thing is bad ass. When you sound them in there it ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is bad ass. When you sound them in there it a bit of resistance. Honestly it's no big deal at all. Just a warning for those looking for a smooth slide
customer_reviews.author: Danny Sevilla

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Product looked in good condition out of the box and works as expected. Packaging was a little suspect, however the product was in working order when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Clover

customer_reviews.title: super for the price
customer_reviews.text: it's great for keeping extra controls charged, displays well, space saver and charges effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Sindy

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit but overall good product
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues, works as intended. Only complaint would be that the Joy con takes a little bit of work to slide in.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: 4 way Joycon charger
customer_reviews.text: We're now able to charge all of our joycons at once. No more getting left out of the Nintendo switch battles
customer_reviews.author: WILSON A IPAYE

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Product works well, is easy to get the controllers on and off. My boys, 6 and 8 are able to use it easily. It was a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie K

customer_reviews.title: Simple, works, gives us a place to put the controllers away.
customer_reviews.text: It makes a great place to store the controllers and make sure they're charged.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Tight fittings for where the controllers slide in but does the job. Just have to be careful removing the controllers from the dock with too much force
customer_reviews.author: Megan F

product_meta.title: Nintendo Switch Joy Con Charger Dock, Sunix 4 in 1 Charging Stand with LED indication for Nintendo Switch Joy Con
product_meta.description:
1. [4 in 1 simultaneously] 
2. [Designed specifically]
3. [Humanization Design]
4. [Over-load protection]
5. [Short circuit protection]
6. [Under-voltage protection]
7. [Lightweight and Solid]

[Compatibility and Design]
Nintendo Switch[2017]

Color: Black

[Package Included]
2X Sunix 4 in 1 Charging Dock for Nintendo Switch


[Sunix Products Warranty]
If something went wrong with our products, we will gladly replace it with another.
feature_bullets: 4 in 1 Charger Dock Designed specifically for Nintendo Switch gamer
Allows you to securely store and charge up 4 Joy-Con Controllers simultaneously, which applies to all USB interface with 5A Voltage.
When faced with overcharge, over discharged or short circuit, the intelligent circuit can automatically cut off the power for safety.
Lightweight and Solid: Made of high quality material, lightweight and portable; Trapezoid Design make the center of gravity more closer to the center and more stable
NOTE - Joy-Con controllers and Nintendo Switch are not included and are only shown in images for illustrative purposes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars651 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
